tasks.title: Complete Project Report
tasks.description: Prepare and submit the project report by end of the week.

tasks.title: Team Meeting
tasks.description: Attend the team meeting for project discussion.

tasks.title: Client Follow-up
tasks.description: Call the client to discuss project requirements.

tasks.title: Database Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize the database for faster query response.

tasks.title: Code Review
tasks.description: Review team code submissions for the sprint.

tasks.title: Prepare Presentation
tasks.description: Create slides for the upcoming client presentation.

tasks.title: Team Feedback
tasks.description: Provide feedback to team members on performance.

tasks.title: Bug Fixing
tasks.description: Resolve bugs reported in the QA testing phase.

tasks.title: Client Demo
tasks.description: Conduct a demo for the client on the new feature release.

tasks.title: Documentation
tasks.description: Complete documentation for the new module.

tasks.title: API Development
tasks.description: Develop and test new APIs for the mobile app.

tasks.title: Sprint Planning
tasks.description: Plan tasks for the upcoming sprint with the team.

tasks.title: Backend Refactoring
tasks.description: Refactor backend code for better efficiency.

tasks.title: System Update
tasks.description: Install updates on the company's servers.

tasks.title: Inventory Check
tasks.description: Check the inventory for hardware and software needs.

tasks.title: Security Audit
tasks.description: Conduct a security audit of the company's IT infrastructure.
